row.process:
! --------------------------------------------- :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'DynKonv_Bearb' :SET &DEFAULT# = 'J' :SET &BRIEFNUMMER# = '11' :SET &BEARBEITER# = '800' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p012_&TS#.out' :SET &CTV_WARNFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/DynKonv_Bearb_Warnings.txt'
! --------------------------------------------- :INC JOBI.BS20_EXPORT_LOGDIR ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# ANZAHL = &ANZAHL_VTR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# BEARBEITER = &BEARBEITER# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# [BEARBEITER] BRIEFE = &BRIEFE_CTV# DEFAULT = &DEFAULT# BRIEFNUMMER = &BRIEFNUMMER# CTV_WARNFILE = &CTV_WARNFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
